plot: A horrible crime, committed by a rich woman and her lover, is witnessed by a young boy. The boy lives in fear of his life and is unable to tell anyone what he saw.
title: Los ojos de un niño
plot_es: A horrible crime, committed by a rich woman and her lover, is witnessed by a young boy. The boy lives in fear of his life and is unable to tell anyone what he saw.
plot_en: A horrible crime, committed by a rich woman and her lover, is witnessed by a young boy. The boy lives in fear of his life and is unable to tell anyone what he saw.
